item.title: Schedule Your Edit: A Simple yet Effective Diffusion Noise Schedule for Image Editing
item.description: Logistic Schedule: A novel noise schedule revolutionizes image editing by improving DDIM inversion, enhancing content preservation and edit fidelity without model retraining!
